cards.title: Luxury accommodation

about.subtitle: About Us
about.title:
A Place Where Luxury Comes Gently And
Every Stay Feels Like Coming Home Crafted
for the Soul.
about.text: Tucked along the quiet coast, Serenova is more than a destination—it's a philosophy of peace, space, and soulful hospitality. Each villa, every curated experience, and every thoughtful touch is designed to help you reconnect—with yourself, your loved ones, and nature. Here, luxury comes quietly, and life unfolds at the pace of the ocean.

best.subtitle: the best of the best
best.title: Experiences That Move You
best.text: Whether you're sailing across the horizon, discovering hidden trails, or immersing yourself in local traditions, Serenova offers experiences that go beyond luxury—they stay with you long after you leave.

tours.subtitle: Our Tours
tours.title: Curated Tours for the Curious Soul

offer.subtitle: Offer
offer.title: Reserve your stay 30 days in advance and enjoy 20% off on your booking.
offer.text: At Serenova, we believe that luxury should arrive gently—and so should your savings. Plan ahead and unlock special privileges crafted for discerning travelers.

lifestyle.subtitle: Luxury Lifestyle
lifestyle.title: The Journey Begins with a Click
lifestyle.text: Choose your stay. We'll take care of the rest.

testimonials.text: From our spacious villa to the cultural tours, everything was perfect. Serenova made us feel at home while giving us experiences we’ll never forget.
I’ve traveled widely, but Serenova has a rare magic. Every detail is carefully thought out, and every experience feels personal.
The service, the food, the surroundings—it’s everything luxury should be: effortless, peaceful, and unforgettable.

aboutDo.subtitle: What We Do
aboutDo.title: Moments Made with Purpose
aboutDo.text: At Serenova, we create more than just stays we create states of being. Every moment here is thoughtfully designed to slow you down, calm your senses, and reconnect you with the present.

aboutTraveler.subtitle: for travelers
aboutTraveler.title: We create immersive trips that enable you to discover the world

travels.title: Transportation service
travels.text: From private airport pickups to curated day tours, we handle every journey with care so you can focus on relaxing.

travels.title: Culinary Experiences

aboutPlaces.subtitle: beautiful places
aboutPlaces.title: Fascinating travel destinations for tourism
aboutPlaces.text: At Serenova, we believe travel should be more than movement  it should be transformation. That’s why we curate unique, soul-stirring destinations designed to inspire your senses and ground your spirit.

aboutVacation.subtitle: take a vacation
aboutVacation.title: Stop dreaming, start traveling now
aboutVacation.text:
The world isn’t meant to be admired from a distance.
It’s meant to be felt through warm sands beneath your feet, fresh sea air in your lungs, and quiet sunsets that linger longer than words.

At Serenova, we turn wanderlust into reality. Whether you're seeking solitude, romance, or simply a change of pace, your perfect escape is waiting.

filterData.title: Palm Cove Villa
filterData.description: Lose yourself in the rhythmic sound of waves just steps away from your door. The Palm Cove Villa is a serene retreat designed for intimacy and indulgence. Featuring a sun-kissed private pool, airy interiors.

filterData.title: Lagoon Edge Pavilion
filterData.description: Cradled at the edge of our tranquil lagoon, this pavilion offers direct water access and uninterrupted views of lush mangroves and crystal waters. Drift off on your outdoor daybed, soak in your starlit freestanding tub.

filterData.title: Sunset Ridge Suite
filterData.description: Rising high above the coastline, Sunset Ridge Suite offers the most mesmerizing views of Serenova. This elegantly designed suite is ideal for those who want to indulge — featuring a curated wine cellar, an indoor-outdoor entertainment lounge.

filterData.title: Jungle Hideaway
filterData.description: Surrounded by lush rainforest and birdsong, the Jungle Hideaway is your portal to solitude and restoration. Built with raw textures and eco-conscious materials, it features a suspended hammock lounge, rainfall shower.

filterData.title: Sky Loft Residence
filterData.description: Perched on the highest elevation of the resort, the Sky Loft Residence is a contemporary masterpiece that blends openness, light, and design. With expansive living space, a panoramic sky-view lounge, and a floating glass balcony.

offerPackages.subtitle: Pakages
offerPackages.title: Our Curated Stay Packages
offerPackages.text: At Serenova, we believe every guest deserves more than just a stay — they deserve an experience. Our thoughtfully designed packages combine the best of beachfront bliss, fine dining, adventure.

offerFilter.title: Tropical Escape
offerFilter.description: Unwind in coastal luxury — book two nights and enjoy a third night on us. Wake up to the sound of waves and bask in the serenity of Serenova.

offerFilter.title: Sunset Safari Stay
offerFilter.description: Pair your coastal getaway with an unforgettable guided nature tour. Includes early morning breakfast and evening beach bonfire.

offerFilter.title: Wellness Retreat
offerFilter.description: Immerse in rejuvenation with daily yoga, guided meditation, and a complimentary 60-minute massage during your stay.

offerFilter.title: Romantic Getaway
offerFilter.description: Surprise your partner with a romantic escape. Includes rose petal room setup, private beach dinner, and spa for two.

offerFilter.title: Family Fun Package
offerFilter.description: Explore, play, and bond. Includes a family suite, kid-friendly activities, and a sunset cruise for the whole family.

offerAbout.subtitle: Escape. Indulge. Save.
offerAbout.title:
Discover exclusive offers and packages
designed to elevate your Serenova experience.
Whether it’s a romantic escape,
offerAbout.text: We believe that true luxury lies in the details a complimentary spa ritual, a sunset dinner by the ocean, or simply more time to breathe. Explore our seasonal offers and handpicked experiences that bring together value and indulgence in perfect harmony.  At Serenova, every stay is more than a vacation — it's a tailored journey into luxury, serenity, and unforgettable moments. Our exclusive offers and thoughtfully bundled packages are designed to enhance your time with us, whether you're seeking romance, relaxation, adventure, or quality family time. From sun-kissed coastal retreats to wellness-infused escapes, each package reflects our commitment to elevated hospitality and timeless comfort.

spaAbout.subtitle: Wellness & Spa at Serenova
spaAbout.title:
our spa and wellness rituals are more than
treatments they are soulful journeys curated to
awaken your senses and restore inner balance.
spaAbout.text: From time-honored therapies to modern-day rejuvenation techniques, Serenova’s spa menu reflects a deep commitment to holistic healing and gentle luxury. Let the ocean breeze guide your breath, and the tranquility of our coastal surroundings bring you back to yourself. Whether you're unwinding in our aromatic steam rooms, practicing sunrise yoga by the ocean, or indulging in a sea mineral massage, every experience is designed to renew your body and quiet your mind. Step into a sanctuary of stillness where nature’s rhythms meet the healing touch of expert hands.

spaTraveler.subtitle: Wellness Hours
spaTraveler.title: Indulge in the Art of Renewal by the Sea
spaTraveler.note: *Simply let us know at least 30 minutes ahead, and we’ll gladly prepare the sauna and steam bath for your preferred time.

slides.title: Signature Serenity Massage
slides.text:
Our most popular treatment combines rhythmic strokes and warm aromatherapy oils to promote full-body relaxation.

Duration: 60 / 90 minutes

slides.title: Deep Tissue Revival
slides.text:
Targets chronic muscle tension with firm pressure and slow strokes, ideal for relieving stiffness and soreness.

Duration: 60 / 90 minutes

slides.title: Hot Stone Harmony
slides.text:
Warm, smooth stones are placed on key points to melt away tension and improve blood circulation for deep relaxation.

Duration: 75 / 90 minutes

slides.title: Reflexology Rebalance
slides.text:
Focuses on pressure points in the feet, hands, and ears to restore energy flow and promote holistic body balance.

Duration: 45 / 60 minutes

slides.title: Aromatherapy Bliss
slides.text:
Combines gentle massage techniques with essential oils to uplift mood, reduce stress, and enhance overall well-being.

Duration: 60 minutes

spaIndulge.subtitle: Indulge in the Art of Relaxation
spaIndulge.title: Where Wellness Becomes a Way of Life

eventsAbout.subtitle: Unforgettable Moments
eventsAbout.title:
Celebrate Life’s Most Cherished Events at
Serenova we believe every celebration
deserves more than just a venue
eventsAbout.text: At Serenova, we understand that the most meaningful events in life deserve more than just a beautiful setting — they deserve careful intention, thoughtful design, and the magic of a place that inspires awe. That’s why we’ve curated a destination where celebrations aren’t just hosted — they’re lived, felt, and remembered forever. From barefoot beach weddings bathed in golden light to sophisticated corporate retreats designed for clarity and connection, Serenova offers a seamless blend of natural beauty and world-class service. Imagine exchanging vows as waves kiss the shore, hosting a sunset cocktail party on a floating deck, or gathering your closest friends for an intimate candlelit dinner under a sky full of stars. Our team of dedicated event planners and hospitality experts handle every detail.

eventsFilter.title: Tropical Beach Wedding
eventsFilter.description: Say “I do” under the golden sun with the gentle ocean breeze. Our beach wedding package includes full planning, décor, a sunset ceremony, and luxury dining for guests.

eventsFilter.title: Corporate Island Retreat
eventsFilter.description: Host productive meetings in paradise. Includes accommodation bundles, tech-enabled spaces, team-building experiences, and wellness add-ons.

eventsFilter.title: Private Celebration Dinner
eventsFilter.description: Immerse in rejuvenation with daily yoga, guided meditation, and a complimentary 60-minute massage during your stay.

eventsFilter.title: Cultural Fest Evenings
eventsFilter.description: Experience vibrant local culture through music, dance, and cuisine. These community-style events add authentic flavor to your Serenova stay.

eventsFilter.title: Family Reunion Getaway
eventsFilter.description: Reconnect with loved ones in a luxurious setting. This package includes multi-room accommodations, guided activities, group dining, and dedicated hosts.

facilitiesAbout.subtitle: Explore World-Class Facilities
facilitiesAbout.title:
Curated Spaces for Inspired Living Facilities
Modern Comforts & Timeless Hospitality That
Reflect the Spirit of Serenova
facilitiesAbout.text: At Serenova, each facility is a crafted space of purpose — whether it’s for relaxation, activity, rejuvenation, or togetherness. Explore thoughtfully curated spaces built to enhance your stay, all designed with a blend of elegance, modernity, and serenity. Every corner of Serenova is thoughtfully designed to enhance your comfort, leisure, and well-being, with world-class amenities that blend elegance and functionality. From tranquil wellness areas to vibrant activity zones, our offerings ensure your stay is as relaxing or adventurous as you desire. Our handpicked amenities are designed to nurture connection, relaxation, and joy in every moment of your stay.
